meanings.definition: The electric current or potential produced by living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Bioelectricity is what makes our muscles move.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are researching bioelectricity in frogs.
meanings.sent3: The bioelectricity in the fish tank seemed to give the goldfish extra energy.
meanings.sent4: The bioelectricity in the air crackled with life.
meanings.sent5: The concept of bioelectricity can be both fascinating and mysterious.

meanings.definition: The study of electrical phenomena in living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Bioelectricity involves examining how electricity works in plants.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are learning a lot from the field of bioelectricity.
meanings.sent3: The class on bioelectricity was electrifying, quite literally.
meanings.sent4: In the world of biology, bioelectricity is like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: Studying bioelectricity opens up a whole new world of possibilities in science.
